alerts.title: Mask Policy
alerts.subtitle: All patients and family 2 years and older are required to wear a mask in our office

alerts.title: Our Lakewood Office Moved!
alerts.subtitle: Our new address is: 3333 S Wadsworth Blvd, B103

alerts.copy: "We belong to each other. Together, regardless of race and beyond race, we must want what is right for each other, aspire for better, and work for greater if we are to leave the generations of youth that will come after us a just and equitable society..." excerpt from *The Traumatic Impact of Racism and Discrimination on Young People and How to Talk About it from AAP Reaching Teens, 2nd edition*
alerts.title: Let's make the world better for ALL children
alerts.subtitle: Open the link at the bottom of our webpage to read the full document from the AAP
